entry.title: Destiny Hearts
entry.summary:
Author: Lightfeather94

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 9,692Chapters: 4/?Kudos: 63

Summary: One fight was all it took.One battle that she couldn't contain in Paris. A fight so devastating that the world leaders were left with no other choice.Soul mates for the good of the world needed to be found, and kept together. The crimes committed due to loss of soul mates would no longer be ignored. Punished to the highest cost, in hopes of never repeating what the world had endured.How are super heroes supposed to keep their identities safe though when forced to be under the same roof?

entry.title: Lie Lie Lie
entry.summary:
Author: krono20112025

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 59,439Chapters: 19/52Kudos: 247

Summary: Marinette Dupain-Cheng had a grand falling out with Adrien. He had learned the truth, that his father was Hawk Moth and his girlfriend had kept this secret. Chrysalis was dead,her life was spiraling out of despair. Her Maman let her leave with her Uncle Wang, but not to Shanghai. Hey, there is another restaurant opening in Gotham, and Uncle Wang needed a helper. Goodbye, City of Love, and welcome, Capital City of Crime. __________________________________________________________________ Damian Wayne does not get “dumped”. However, given the Wayne Gala is close and his brothers plan to make fun of his being alone, Damian needs a plan of action: a pretend girlfriend. The target? His friend, Maps Mizoguchi. Approaching the raven-haired under the tree, he gives the order for a romantic alliance. But when the girl turns around, it’s not Maps. It’s a confused French transfer student holding a macaron. A lesser man would apologize for the mistake. Damian Wayne? He doubles down. She has the right hair. She is a variable he can control. “You,” he decides, refusing to admit error. “You are an acceptable substitute. Don’t be late.”

entry.title: Damian’s Immortal Time Travel Shenanigans
entry.summary:
Author: Leia_of_the_Meadows

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 5,591Chapters: 3/?Kudos: 25

Summary: Damian's life was finally steady, well as steady as a superheroes life can get. He was going to college, being invited to join in on some of the Justice League missions, and his family was being less insufferable. But then a spotted heroine had to throw everything he ever thought he knew into question. The Mage who crafted the miraculous started so well, but in the end, he made one mistake with the Bunny Miraculous, causing a chain reaction across time and space. It pulled miraculous holders from various times in history back to the beginning. Now, Damian has to deal with an annoying group of holders from multiple places and times as they try to figure out how to get back to their times. This is a duology, and can be read either simultaneously or one after another. This is Damian's POV.

entry.title: An Email Away
entry.summary:
Author: LovelyLore

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 50,837Chapters: 24/25Kudos: 11,176

Summary: Marinette had been startled to find out that her school and a school in America were collaborating to do a pen pal assignment. To be fair, the assignment was suppose to help the students with the grammar of the language they were learning. Marinette pulled a random name out of the box. She hoped Damian wrote good French and that she could write well enough English.

entry.title: Marinette’s Immortal Time Travel Shenanigans
entry.summary:
Author: Leia_of_the_Meadows

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,622Chapters: 3/?Kudos: 23

Summary: Marinette isn't 5,000 years old. That would be silly, of course. It was other people who carried the Ladybug miraculous before her, and they were the ones we saw in ancient texts. But what if they weren't? The Mage who crafted the miraculous started so well, but in the end, he made one mistake with the Bunny Miraculous, causing a chain reaction across time and space. It pulled miraculous holders from various times in history back to the beginning. Now, Marinette has to deal with a ragtag group of holders from multiple places and times as they try to figure out how to get back to their times. This is a duology, and can be read either simultaneously or one after another. This is Marinette's POV.

entry.title: My Chat Was Actually a Bat?
entry.summary:
Author: BluCl0ud

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 48,705Chapters: 11/26Kudos: 172

Summary: They say the Universe sends its best guardians in the form of small animals. Whether it be man's best friend or a prideful ancient god that enters one’s life. Slowly, one begins to heal by the mere existence of a loving pet to come home to. Ladybug has certainly seen better days, so what becomes of her life when a strangely affectionate black cat comes to burrow its way into her exhausted heart?   TLDR:Damian is often described as a black cat in many fics, he even became one in an official comic release (partially). So I will make him a cat but with lore.

entry.title: We're not acquaintances! (That's good, I'd rather be more)
entry.summary:
Author: Fangirl_Who_Died

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 11,176Chapters: 13/23Kudos: 272

Summary: Tim Drake-Wayne was known for consuming an unholy (and illegal) amount of coffee. Tim Drake-Wayne was also known for bonding with people over coffee. Unfortunately (or fortunately, depending on who you ask) one of those people happened to be Marinette Dupain-Cheng. “...Wait, did you just say Marine-?” (Ah, cue Damian reminding me that this daminette I'm writing. Hold on, pretty boy, this is slowwww burn.) Or Tim brought a French girl home. Said girl can tame even the most wild pets, and can be be calm in the face of Damian holding a katana to her neck. Wait wha- (Rewrote the summary cuz chapter 2 changed the scene)

entry.title: The after effects of An Akuma.
entry.summary:
Author: Fateofwar

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 36,038Chapters: 12/?Kudos: 416

Summary: The idea for this work goes to Lilavaporizer9000, some part might be similar.I have little knowing of The DC world as compared to the Heralds and enforcers reading this fanfic. Some characters might be ooc, and if you find any case do tell.And English is not my first language, so any mistake or error is purely due to intervention of the keyboard and my spite for the language if I have any. So, Damian Wayne needs a girlfriend. His family won't stop pestering him with a normal teen life, not after he told them it would be better to spend 24 hours in the asylum rather than in this place where everyone seems to be losing their brain cells.A normal girlfriend would shut them better than anything. Which proved more difficult than solving criminal cases and fighting a Superman with a kryptonite dagger.The second option is find a small group of humans to meet his needs. Which seems impossible considering his general distain for them, as Dick calls it. He is one for sure.Luckily there is a match. Marinette Dupin-Cheng. She’s intelligent, quiet, respectful of his boundaries— generally acceptable.

entry.title: Defenders of the Universe
entry.summary:
Author: aldanavroon

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 20,730Chapters: 18/?Kudos: 166

Summary: In a universe where divine forces walk reborn among mortals, balance is everything—and it’s breaking. The ancient Order of Guardians has fallen. Chaos stirs. And four Souls, once meant to appear one at a time, have returned all at once. Creation. Destruction. Lie. Intuition. They’re not ready. They’re not trusted. And one of them looks a little too much like someone Batman once called his son. As legends rise and secrets unravel, the fate of the multiverse may rest on the shoulders of children—ones who carry the weight of gods.

entry.title: Bad Idea Right?
entry.summary:
Author: krono20112025

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 9,941Chapters: 6/6Kudos: 104

Summary: ​Desperate to move on from a decade of solitude, Damian Wayne uses a magical artifact to find his soulmate, only to be transformed into a Corgi and delivered to the doorstep of Marinette Dupain-Cheng. Now, the deadly Batman must survive life as a cute accessory to a world-famous cute fashion designer who is just as lonely as he is.

entry.title: I Got Isekai’d Into Miraculous—Now They Want Me to Break the Love-Square?! Tch. I’m a Robin. I’ll Fix It My Way.
entry.summary:
Author: krono20112025

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 138,608Chapters: 53/60Kudos: 427

Summary: Five years Damian waited for the last Miraculous Ladybug manga, and the ending sucks. Enraged, he boasted he could write a better story. A mischievous, fourth-dimensional imp quickly appears and gives him a chance to prove his claim. To prevent a disappointing ending, he must change the plot as he sees fit. What would a genius detective, Robin, do in the MLB Universe, to cause Chaos of course! ​He wakes up in a world where he is dead, but Alfred is his living ally. With just seven days until the plot kicks off, Damian dedicates himself to healing the fractured Batfamily, slowly putting the pieces back together. But he can multitask. To prevent the Love Square, he decides to aggressively befriend Marinette Dupain-Cheng the only way a Wayne knows how: by replacing her friends with competent ones and burying her under a mountain of gifts. Who knew purchasing platonic affection required so much cashmere?

entry.title: Time and Time again
entry.summary:
Author: ew_selfish_art

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 8,968Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 81

Summary: Damian finds himself waking up on Friday. Everyday. He's been stuck for almost two weeks and he's tried mostly everything... But every conversation with Ladybug seems to bring him to a new lead, and he can't help but feel compelled to seek her out each day. He doesn't know what's happened, but one day her demeanor changes and he can't stop thinking about it. He needs to learn a lesson to break the spell, right?

entry.title: A Guardian for Gotham
entry.summary:
Author: YukimuraShuusukeGirl

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,719Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 62

Summary: After defeating Hawkmoth, Marinette moves to Gotham for a fresh start and a normal life. But staying retired is hard when you're a Guardian with hero instincts, Gotham keeps exploding, and the Bat Boys have decided you're interesting. A reverse harem romance about healing, identity, and finding love with people who understand what it means to wear a mask.

entry.title: Betrayal Wears Many Faces
entry.summary:
Author: YukimuraShuusukeGirl

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,006Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 65

Summary: At eighteen, Marinette Dupain-Cheng is the Guardian of the Miraculouses, a successful designer under the pseudonym MDC, and completely alone. Lila's lies have destroyed her reputation, turned her friends against her, and made Paris suffocating. When Wayne Enterprises offers her a collaboration program in Gotham, Marinette takes the escape—planning to portal back for akuma attacks while building a new life far from the toxicity.What she doesn't expect is Damian Wayne: brilliant, dangerous, and somehow able to see past every mask she wears. As Marinette falls for the boy who brings her coffee every morning, Ladybug finds an unexpected partnership with Robin on Gotham's streets. Two identities, one person, and a romance that might finally give her a reason to believe in happiness again.With Hawk Moth's defeat on the horizon and secrets between them, Marinette will have to decide: keep hiding, or trust someone with the truth for the first time in months.

entry.title: Smiling Through
entry.summary:
Author: AKP31E

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 7,239Chapters: 6/?Kudos: 97

Summary: Damian Wayne doesn’t always get to do what he wants. Sometimes he simply has to smile through the unpleasant things, and sometimes the things that start out unpleasant turn out to be the best things in the end. Meeting Marinette occurred during one of those unpleasant things, and he thinks that if he can convince her to stay by his side that all the other unpleasant things he has to do would be much better, and he wouldn’t have to work quite so hard to smile through.

  • No Archive Warnings Apply
